name: Four Crystals
description:
Four Crystals is a puzzle/action game. Where you have to get the four crystals on the end of each bridge to clear the game.

10 seconds gameplay:

Version 1.0 is the submited to Ludum Dare 37.

Version 1.2 has some post Ludum Dare fixes.

Version 1.3 Particles! And dash buffs!
